name: GerikTalkEphraim
_source: speak;Gerik;I'm Gerik, mercenary commander.|Prince Innes bought our swords and sent use here to join you.|Any problem with that?
speak;Gerik;Yeah, and the prince had a message for you as well.|He said.|"I've no need of assistance, Ephraim, but I'm sure you do."|That's all.|I figured you would know what he was talking about.
speak;Ephraim;Well, that's definitely from Innes.|Regardless, your aid is welcome.|Please join us in our fight.
